page.title: 14A DAY IN DONNA'S LIFE
page.content: On Sunday I got up at 9 o'clock. I had a bowl of Rice _ Krispies and then I got dressed and then I did a bit of gardening. Then I helped dad to wash the car. Then we all had dinner. When the car dried we went to Little Grans for tea. We saw Uncle and Auntie who were just having tea. I saw their rabbit. My Uncle and Auntie did have two rabbits but one died when he was away on holiday but the children did not go so then they could look after the rabbit and one died when they were looking after it so now there is only one rabbit left. I went home and got to bed at 9 o'clock. I was very tired. I went to sleep straight away .
